attributes.action: Legalise the possession of pepper spray for self-defence
attributes.additional_details: Legalise the sale and possession of approved and regulated pepper sprays, with  personal licencing if needs be. If licencing is needed it must come at no cost to the holder, as critical personal safety cannot hold a price
attributes.background: Legalise the possession of pepper spray for personal carry. Women are harassed, and attacked in the UK on a huge scale, often having to walk with keys between their fingers as a defense weapon. Pepper spray offers a non-lethal, distanced defense, and deterrent from attacks on lone women

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577568
